name: RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats.pliCount
description: The pliCount property of the RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats dictionary states the number of times the remote peer's RTCRtpReceiver sent a Picture Loss Indication (PLI) packet to the RTCRtpSender for which this object provides statistics.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats.pliCount - Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
